name: Meteor-Strike of Love
effect: [Main]/[Counter] You may add 1 card from the top of your Life cards to your hand: Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +3000 power during this turn.

name: Gum-Gum King Kong Gatling
effect: [Main] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +3000 power during this turn. Then, if your opponent has a Character with 7000 power or more, up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +1000 power during this turn.
trigger: [Trigger] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 5000 power or less.

name: Blue Dragon Seal Water Stream
effect: [Main] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 5000 power or less.
trigger: [Trigger] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 4000 power or less.

name: The Billion-fold World Trichiliocosm
effect: [Counter] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +2000 power during this battle. Then, if you have 8 or more rested cards, that card gains an additional +2000 power during this battle.
trigger: [Trigger] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's rested Characters with a cost of 3 or less.

name: You Ain't Even Worth Killing Time!!
effect:
[Main] Choose one:
• Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 6 or less.
• K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's rested Characters with a cost of 6 or less.
trigger: [Trigger] Activate this card's [Main] effect.

name: Shark Arrows
effect: [Main] K.O. up to 2 of your opponent's rested Characters with a cost of 3 or less.
trigger: [Trigger] Activate this card's [Main] effect.

name: Ama no Murakumo Sword
effect: [Main] Place up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 2 or less and up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 1 or less at the bottom of the owner's deck in any order.
trigger: [Trigger] Activate this card's [Main] effect.

name: But I Will Never Doubt a Woman's Tears!!!!
effect: [Main] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +1000 power during this turn. Then, reveal 1 card from the top of your deck, play up to 1 Character card with a cost of 2, and place the rest at the top or bottom of your deck.
trigger: [Trigger] Play up to 1 Character card with a cost of 2 from your hand.

name: Gravity Blade Raging Tiger
effect: [Main] Place up to 2 Characters with a cost of 6 or less at the bottom of the owner's deck in any order.
trigger: [Trigger] Place up to 1 Character with a cost of 5 or less at the bottom of the owner's deck.

name: White Snake
effect: [Counter] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +1000 power during this turn, and draw 1 card.
trigger: [Trigger] Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck and place them at the top or bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Black Bug
effect: [Main] If the number of DON!! cards on your field is equal to or less than the number on your opponent's field,  place up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 5 or less at the bottom of the owner's deck.
trigger: [Trigger] Place up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 4 or less at the bottom of the owner's deck.

name: GERMA 66
effect: [Main] Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 card with a type including "GERMA" other than [GERMA 66] and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
trigger: [Trigger] Draw 1 card.

name: Shadows Asgard
types: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
effect: [Main]/[Counter] Your Leader gains +1000 power during this turn. Then, you may K.O. any number of your {Thriller Bark Pirates} type Characters with a cost of 2 or less. Your Leader gains an additional +1000 power during this turn for every Character K.O.'d.
trigger: [Trigger] Draw 2 cards and trash 1 card from your hand.

name: ...Nothing...at All!!!
effect: [Counter] You may add 1 card from the top of your Life cards to your hand: Your Characters with a cost of 7 or less cannot be K.O.'d in battle during this turn.
trigger: [Trigger] Activate this card's [Counter] effect.

name: Negative Hollow
effect: [Main] Trash 1 card from your opponent's hand.
trigger: [Trigger] Activate this card's [Main] effect.

name: You're the One Who Should Disappear.
effect: [Counter] You may trash 1 card from your hand: Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +3000 power during this battle.
trigger: [Trigger] If you have 0 Life cards, you may add up to 1 card from the top of your deck to the top of your Life cards. Then, trash 1 card from your hand.

name: Reject
effect:
[Main] Choose one:
• K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 5 or less.
• If your opponent has 1 Life card, deal 1 damage to your opponent. Then, add 1 card from the top of your Life cards to your hand.
trigger: [Trigger] Draw 1 card.
